summary: This is an email chain from November 15, 2019, forwarding a voice message from an attorney named David Hall regarding the Epstein case. The message indicates an attorney was seeking a contact at the Southern District of New York (SDNY) and was referred by a former Assistant U.S. Attorney in Cleveland.

persons.name: David Hall
persons.context: An attorney who left a voice message seeking an SDNY contact regarding the Epstein case. The message was forwarded via email.

connections.description: The former Assistant U.S. Attorney in Cleveland gave David Hall's contact information to the email sender, facilitating Hall's attempt to reach SDNY.

events.title: Voice message from attorney David Hall
events.description: Attorney David Hall leaves a voice message seeking a contact at the Southern District of New York regarding the Epstein case.

keyFacts: An attorney named David Hall was actively seeking a contact at the SDNY in relation to the Epstein case in November 2019.
The referral chain involved a former Assistant U.S. Attorney in Cleveland, indicating professional legal networks were being utilized.
The correspondence shows ongoing legal and investigative activity related to the Epstein case after his death in August 2019.
